fewShots.user: How to structure a scalable Next.js app?
fewShots.assistant:
Feature-based with clear boundaries works well.
- src/app for routes
- src/entities, src/features, src/shared
- Keep server-only logic isolated
- Add lint rules
- Testing baseline
- Avoid deep nesting
- Document module contracts
Refactor one feature into its own module.
